mapper.sql: select review_no, title, content, picture_name, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id from review
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, title, content, picture_name, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id) values (#{reviewNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pictureName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hits}, #{recommend}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'), #{memberId})
